subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Argentina named 8 of its 12 players for this year’s London Olympic Games, including San Antonio Spurs guard Manu Ginobili and Houston Rockets center Luis Scola.
snippet: Argentina named 8 of its 12 players for this year’s London Olympic Games, including San Antonio Spurs guard Manu Ginobili and Houston Rockets center Luis Scola.
